website_summaries.verdict: A rechargeable, lightweight, and portable shaver that can fold down for storage. Features a comfortable ergonomic design.
pros: Fold this shaver out and lock in place
Measures over 2 inches when fully extended for hard-to-reach areas
Ergonomic rubberized soft grip handle is comfortable to use
The 1.5-inch wide blade offers a smooth shave
Offers a great battery life between charges
cons: It may occasionally pull hairs, compared to a manual wet shaver

customer_reviews.title: Mission complete
customer_reviews.text: How have I not owned this all my adult life? I shaved my back and shoulders in 3 minutes. Done for about 2 months then repeat. So simple and easy I laughed out loud. 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: It works better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: It can be used against your skin without worrying about skin cuts or abrasion even in those sensitive areas. Highly reccommendad.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the job, and clearly better than the manual competition.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the job. It has all the reach you need and the blades trim close without "biting". I've tried the large non-electric back shavers and they are pretty ineffective because you have to get the angle on the blade just right. The build quality is acceptable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly as described. My first one lasted 3 years with the same blade. Would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking Clean and Neat.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the original. No more neck or back or body hair. No irritation. So portable.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Does not cut hair at all.
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't even cut the finest of hairs. Idk if I was delivered a defective unit but its fully charged and I can see the blades moving from side to side. Still does not cut at all. Can you pls fix this issue by sending a properly functioning groomer pls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he said it works great. He had the earlier model of this and said this one is much better and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie A

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of adjustment to figure out how to hold the thing and move your arm, but once you get the routine down, this works as it should and that pesky back hair is as good as gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Krueger

customer_reviews.title: It gets the hard to reach areas of your back & everything else.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. The older I’ve gotton the hairer I’ve become. Razor shaving has become a hassle. This bad boy is a dream. Recommend for all my hair single brothers out there.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great don't know how i lived without this so long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really helps grooming in places only a contortionists could otherwise reach.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Side effect of some medication starting growing hair all over my torso. This product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Burden

customer_reviews.title: ... was skeptical about this product but I have always hated asking anyone else to shave my back or going ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but I have always hated asking anyone else to shave my back or going in to get waxed. Figured worse case scenario I would be out a few bucks. I was super impressed with how well this worked and how close of a shave I got from an electric razor. I am a very inflexible man and I was able to reach every inch of my back with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: It has been amazing for me. No issues and works great. I wish I had this product years ago. It leaves my back smooth and looking perfect....the rechargeable battery lasts quite awhile too. I’m very impressed with how well it worked. I’m a very hairy person and the shaver has no problem keeping my back smooth. Lastly, it doesn’t hurt and never cuts me.
customer_reviews.author: Emilene F.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shaver if you have a hair on your back!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome!! No more asking the wife or kids to buzz my back. I wish I knew about this buzzer along time ago.!
customer_reviews.author: James slifer

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: It was really hard for me to trim my back hair and I didn't want to rely on others for this. I started using Mangroomer and it works! Its able to reach the whole back. I suggest trying different angles until you find the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Andre de Souza

customer_reviews.title: This actually works
customer_reviews.text: After trying one of the non-electric razors. I went with this. It works. It doesn't hurt, but will leave the back a little red. It's been a week and hair growth has been minimal. I expect to have to use it every 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great body groomer/ back/chest shaver. Great producf2
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. I still use it on my hairy back. Now clean shaven. Less of a bear. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does exactly what it's supposed to. Happy with the results. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind an athletic guy, i need to shave my body hair from time to time, i thought i will never find any back groomer, until i saw it here, its really great, finally i dont need to broke my arms, to shave my back with a regular groomer, its doing the job well, recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lior N.

customer_reviews.title: Back is blood red after using this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a total pain in the back. Yes it trims, but you need to do it several times over to accomplish this. What drives me nuts is how red and irritated my skin is. It'll pinch and knead the skin and you need to move in some pretty uncomfortable arm positions to get your entire back. It's just way too narrow of a product to make a difference. These blades should be twice the size, but it's just a tiny little blade the width of two fingers. Three if your fingers are ridiculously thin. I know for a fact that when this thing dies, I'll be looking elsewhere for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I didn’t look for this sooner. It’s rechargeable, so no batteries. The arm bends and easily locks in a multitude of angles. It trims well and is easy to use. A buddy has a different one with a curved arm and a screen head, but to me this seems better.
customer_reviews.author: jprok50

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use !  Makes Trimming Easy !
customer_reviews.text: Simple design is easy to use and clean. Great non-slip finish. Flexible positions and extensions allow trimming in hard-to-reach places!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Slyter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! I bought for my father who wanted something where he could groom his own back and this is PERFECT! he absolutely loves it! And works great his back was smooth I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittaney

customer_reviews.title: Took me like 45 minutes to an hours to get all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair on my back that can really grow if I don't shave it. Before, I used razor. Took me like 45 minutes to an hours to get all the hair, especially from tough to reach spots. On top of that, I would end up cutting myself. I am happy I came across this. Now, I shave my back within 15 minutes of less and no more cuts. Also, my back is smooth. One of the best things I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! Works fantastic!! I only have some very fine patches of back hair (JOY), and this easily removes it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer for men and women
customer_reviews.text: The best manscaping product ever. I’ve purchased these for wedding gifts, thank you s, whatever. It’s good to use on your sensitive areas as well. Added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive used a regular pair of clippers for years to manscape. Ive ducktaped it to clothes hangers, spatulas, lol all sorts of stuff and it was always a hours long chore. This product is amazing!!!! I cant stress how easy it was to use! Finished with a near razor close shave in 10 min! What a god send for guys like me who have hair growing in places they dont want! I didnt even read the instructions, just plugged the charger in, when the light turned green i went and shaved! The price was great too, thirty some odd bucks, totally worth it, and just in time for summer too!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: Originally I did not like this product because it pulled my hair and it hurt. I emailed the company, and they quickly responded back to me and got me a brand new one quickly. I have tested and approved the new product. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I spent years breaking my shoulders trying to get patches starting to form on my back. Not with this baby. Reaches every spot perfectly. I'm a grisly 6'4 260 pd man and it handles some thick hair with ease. It cuts fast and glides easy. Doesn't nick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Just an Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: super cool and helpful solution to a problem many men have. i've heard of guys strapping straight edge razors to rulers and other implements to extend their reach. that's insane! the mangroomer easily reaches the entire back and does the job in minutes. totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Chadrmcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works. While it doesn't shave you it gets close enough for people not to notice. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: Great groomer for a man that wants to trim his ...
customer_reviews.text: Great groomer for a man that wants to trim his back himself and no longer ask someone to do it for you. Will need to get a mirror to reflect off your main mirror in your bathroom to see what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you have hair in your back!!
customer_reviews.author: Nealy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend Even After 4 Years Of Use!!
customer_reviews.text: Funny, I've purchased my MANGROOMER over 4 years ago, and even though I hesitated buying this since there were a few reviews saying the battery would not hold a charge after a few months or the head dulled quick. I just want to say my back grows like a rain forest so I've used mine long and hard for over 4 years now, and it still holds a charge for several months and works as good as the day I first purchased this item. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Made In America

customer_reviews.title: ... has held up for several years and still cuts great!
customer_reviews.text: this has held up for several years and still cuts great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Makes my back not-embarrassing
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Cuts the hair short, and doesn't pull. It took a minute to get the hang of it (specifically, keeping the blade part flat against my skin), but it's not too hard to handle with a little practice. If you accidentally scrape the corner against your skin then you can end up with some red marks, but it won't cut you. It holds its charge really well too -- I charged it fully when I first bought it several months ago, and haven't charged it again since. I don't use it super regularly, but I have used it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this....No more Chewbacca! Just go slow, and it works great. The only thing that would make it better is if the joints would lock in place. Make it easier to reach those harder areas on the back.
customer_reviews.author: S.Emerson

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend is useless now
customer_reviews.text: Ive always told my girlfriend that the only reason I keep her around is to help me put on the bed sheets and to shave my back. She knows she's on thin ice now that I've discovered this amazing product. Works great gets right down to the skin. Its not as close as a blade would get but closer than any electric face razor I've used. Must have if you have a hairy back. Bonus: Feels just like your using a back scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: This is a very clever product, it works great, it feels like it will last, and it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: What took so long to come up with this great idea. This is a very clever product, it works great, it feels like it will last, and it’s easy to use. If you have tried to do this by yourself you know what a nightmare it can be, nearly impossible, and if you’re like me a little embarrassed, would rather not have somebody help you then this is for you. It has a small learning curve, but after a few times it’s natural. It charges quickly, has plenty of power, it has a rubberized coating all over for gripping, and makes cleaning easy. I would say this a great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: 72Ford

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Arm is stiff and long enough to reach entire back. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for those who need it!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, easy to control, simple to maintain, and after my old one I upgraded to this so I know these can last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan H

customer_reviews.title: Accurate product description and arrived on time. Does exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Accurate product description and arrived on time. Does exactly what it says. Others have complained about the noise, but I look at it as a warning to whomever may barge into the bathroom. Some things can't be unseen.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. My first one was the original battery model and lasted 8yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy this one
customer_reviews.text: What a delight to stay standing and reach my entire back. It's easy light and effective. Oh and did I mention at a great price?
customer_reviews.author: CMD925

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product because it saves the hassle of using an electric razor which is hard to reach back area.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loves it and says it's super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hairy boyfriend. He absolutely loves it and says it's super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: MANGROOMER Professional Do-it-yourself Electric Back Hair Shaver ordered for my son. He loves it, however, has only used once, so we will see if it lasts. I will post again should it break as other reports suggested. However, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: sewmoore

customer_reviews.title: Reach Around achieved!
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10-15 mins to do the back. Worth it if you only have to do it once a week or two. The power and speed were great. No "claw marks" on the back. Although, I'm not sure your friends would make fun of you for shaving if they saw you at the pool/beach. It would probably be more like something to brag about if you know what I mean. The "reach around" worked great and I was able to get the whole back in a short amount of time. 5 stars so far! The only thing I worry about is battery life. Guess we will see!
customer_reviews.author: Lord Swig

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift for my hairy neighbor. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my hairy neighbor. I look over and saw him stoking away on his front porch. He said he is also going to use it to trim up his little dog pal.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brown

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great..
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought one sooner!! This thing works great...I have a very hairy back and I shaved it all of in just 5 minutes. The blade doesn't bother the skin and the angled extending arm are just right. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: aaron spencer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect seller, recomended! good item, accurate description. Good packaging and condition. Thank you very much!

customer_reviews.title: Makes trimming easy and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Makes trimming easy and fast. It just works!

customer_reviews.title: Quality and on time
customer_reviews.text: Met expectation. When I order from Amazon I expect a good product and good delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Good item; loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item but it can be loud and if you go in the wrong direction, it will pull hair and it does hurt. Overall it is a decent product and holds a good charge.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, Wife is happy she doesnt have to do it for me anymore

customer_reviews.title: For the hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: Shaved great. Don't need to go over the same spot twice. Battery charge lasts a long time

customer_reviews.title: I only have very fine and barely visible hairs on my back but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Feels solid. I only have very fine and barely visible hairs on my back but I can see them and know they're there. Nice to have something that can reach them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan William Leary

customer_reviews.title: This machine is amazing and and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was in panic when My back would never be shaved again...never thought there was such a razor out there and when I finally did some research I did not hesitate to purchase it... This machine is amazing and and worth the money ... and now I can shave any time..WOW!!!Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair puller not trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I had the original and loved but finally died. So I thought I’d upgrade to the rechargeable version. I was wrong. It was a downgrade. It pulls the hair more then trimming. You have to make several painful passes. Save your money and buy the battery operated version.
customer_reviews.author: beke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product !!
customer_reviews.text: This makes being a hairy guy a lot easier. This is a very economical product, that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike51

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has literally changed my life. I'm a pretty confident guy, but I know that hairy dudes really gross some people out. Out of courtesy, I generally either avoided swimming and the beach, or I ended up wearing some t-shirt the whole time, which just makes you look like a dork. This thing is great - super easy to use, especially once you've trimmed up to what you want, and are just trimming for "maintenance". Now I can actually run around on the beach shirtless and get a tan, after a lifetime of covering up.
customer_reviews.author: James E Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The first one gave me many years of good use. I think I may have damaged the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Mangroomer. The first one gave me many years of good use. I think I may have damaged the cutter on my old one because it suddenly stopped trimming as well, and began to pull my hair. The new one purrs like a kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Men need grooming and this is the right product for ...
customer_reviews.text: Men need grooming and this is the right product for the right job. Blades are sharp, cut well, and last. Jay Madhav
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Madhav

customer_reviews.title: Fire risk?!
customer_reviews.text: Works great.. Although,,, DO NOT leave this unit plugged in!!! Battery heated up so much that the plastic melted and warped on the handle..
customer_reviews.author: Doejoe

customer_reviews.title: This actually works great. I was skeptical but pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This actually works great. I was skeptical but pleasantly surprised. Highly recommend. It does take overnight to charge but is good after that.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My second Mangroomer. I love this thing. If you have a hairy back, this is exactly what you need so stop looking and buy it. I suffered for years with this issue. After I got my first mangroomer, my back was bare inside of 7 minutes. I bought another one during an Amazon lightening deal so now I have a spare if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: rburton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ive been wanting one of these for a long time. It works great. Very much worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and seems durable , first use on back was better than expected hope the charging doesn't become an issue
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and have used it just once, but I have to say, it's really amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be...
customer_reviews.text: I have used one of these for the last 15 years and this is the second one I have purchased from Amazon. They both were junk. The most recent one is just as bad as the first. It pinches your skin and doesn't cut the hair... all you get is pulling. Not sure what happened as they used to work great. It just seems like the blades are not sharp at all so there is zero hair cutting happening. Skip this and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solution to shaving your back
customer_reviews.text: It's summer. Can't be having a blanket growing on your back. Instead of struggling to stretch my arms to their limit with a crude razor in my hand, I bought this. Works like a charm and the shaver blades themselves seem sharp to cut through some decently thick body hair. But have never gotten a scratch on me from them. Awesome product totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Bearse

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this kind!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the original versions and it was amazing. This one looks nicer but it feels like it's literally ripping the hair out. I bought this almost 6 months ago and they had to replace the first one because it felt like it was ripping the hair out which they replaced very easily. The second one worked well the first couple times but then went right back to the ripping feeling. Now the thing won't even turn on. It says it's fully charged and nothing. Such a shame because I really liked this brand and it worked so well in the first version I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great and so far it still works fine
customer_reviews.text: Went over my order history and noticed I bought this in 2010....AND I'm still using it today (2015)...works great and so far it still works fine...highly recommended....
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: "BEST GIFT EVER"
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer shave my husbands neck and back. I surprised him with this...HE SAID BEST GIFT EVER!! Ladies take care of your men, buy this to help their self confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia M.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product!! I bought an older version on this product and was overall very happy with it, but left painful red marks on my shaved areas. This newer version is much kinder on the body and works extremely well without the discomfort. I would recommend it to any person that is growing hair where they don't want it, except for your privates area...!!!
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY MAN

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It gets all the hard to reach ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It gets all the hard to reach spots and is gentle enough to not cut while still getting rid of all the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Best groomer i ve ever used and i have used quite few
customer_reviews.author: M.Harvalis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Wish it had longer charge life.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Joel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Hairy beast
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect, but it does a good job at making those hard to reach spots presentable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan christensen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Works like a charm, I have rather thick back hair and this product took it right off no problems and actually feels good, sort of like a backscratcher as it removes the hair, I would highly recommend this to men with hairy backs.
customer_reviews.author: FiveStarGeneral

customer_reviews.title: Best product for men!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my man groomer! Being Italian, I can get super hairy.. I couldn't imagine life without this! Never hurts, easy on your skin and leaves you with a smooth stubble. Every man should have this for keeping up to par!! Everyone needs a trim somewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Brian/Dontae

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 would buy
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Its well designed, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Compulsive Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping hairy backs smooth
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these in different apartments. If you're a guy with a hairy back like me, they're great for keeping it smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This thing Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly as described, simple, easy to use and the right price. It shaves smoothly and easily. Can reach my lower back without pulling my shoulder out of socket! Would recommend it highly - great back shaver
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Top Product
customer_reviews.text: Solid built, quiet motor, smooth shaving head. Shaver arm reach is more than sufficient. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Workers well, it does take a mintue to get the hang of using it though. However, once you get the use to it its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tzudee

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo Hair Pile!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. First time user last night. I did it over the sink to check results. I had a pile of nappy ass hair the size of Alaska! I had gotten a massage last week and am now sorry for that poor lady having to kneed through my man carpet. I had enough hair on my back to weave a full sized area rug! Quality build, easy to use, no nicks. Buy it if you want to upgrade from mediocre bar ho's to movie star chicks.
customer_reviews.author: Spank Booty Phresh

customer_reviews.title: Mangroomer review.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, at a fair price. Easy to use, it is very effective, and gets the job done. Cannot think of another product that does this particular job as effectively as the Mangroomer. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KLW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for those that are tired of begging the wife to trim your back before pool visits. If you are doing it for the first time or you have a thick mat, you may wAnt to trim it down with a traditional hair trimmer and then the man groomer can maintain from them on. If it gets too thick this thing will clog and pull your hair. Overall though this makes life easier and trims pretty close to the skin - not beard trimmer close but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended this to all of my friends
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this product has vastly improved my life. I have recommended this to all of my friends. This is my second one, I had the first model for about 6 years before a broke it (All my fault these things are pretty rugged) I would absolutely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Liss

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This baby is so much better than the cheaper one. This is a rechargeable one and it does a real nice job. Im using this until I decide to bite the bullet and do the laser treatment , so for now, this is super. The last one I had used double A batteries and it actually died on me out of no where. I have not had this one very long so I will update this down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Damon AzCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this decades ago.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. I didn’t have any trouble with pulled hair. Was concerned about pics of scratches on guys backs. Aggressive use may leave you with some painless lines that quickly fade. Unlike standard hair clippers, I found no concerns about the angle at which you hold this thing against the skin. I wish I had this thing 30+ years ago. Beats begging your spouse to clean up areas you cant reach with clippers and is a better tool than clippers in general.
customer_reviews.author: JSun

customer_reviews.title: Shave your back without any help
customer_reviews.text: Being a person with a hairy back its annoying when you go shirtless people stare, pick on you, tell you to take off your winter sweater. This cordless razor works excellent it reaches all of the spots on your back. I initially charged the razor before using it and have used it 3 times without having to recharge it. I would highly recommend this razor for anyone that has a hairy back.
customer_reviews.author: Yabba28

customer_reviews.title: Harsher than needed
customer_reviews.text: I thought the people with pictures of red marks just had sensitive skin. But no, this motor is much stronger than needed to cut hair. Maybe some extremely wiry hair or something. But for people looking for an item similar to a hair clipper with a long handle, this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Move
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. The product allows me to groom without asking my wife to help. I like that the handle extends so that I can reach every area that needs to be reached.
customer_reviews.author: Skywave15

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the standard Mangroomer
customer_reviews.text: Owned a mangroomer prior to this for 10 years and decided to upgrade to the rechargeable version. Big mistake. Blades pulled at the hair on my back and didn't cut, plastic tab also broke off when removing the cutting head to see what the issue was. Returned and bought the cheaper version without the rechargeable batteries and it worked perfect. Buy the cheaper version!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job from any angle and is easy to use and is easy to clean. Plenty of power. Regarding battery life, I don't know - I just bought it. It is a rechargeable unit.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, look somewhere else for a better product
customer_reviews.text: Too many cons to using this shaver. First off, unless my back is oddly shaped it’s a giant pain to maneuver around to get the right angle to shave with one pass. The head is simply too small, if you have any sizable area to shave. The worst thing is this shaver scratches the living hell of of my back. I have red scratches all over my back that stay there for a week and right after shaving my skin feels like it’s on fire from all the irritation. Of course I WOULD send it back but I missed the window by 8 hours....neat. Bottoms line look somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't irritate my skin too badly and takes care of my back well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shultz

product_meta.title: MANGROOMER - PROFESSIONAL Do-It-Yourself Electric Back Hair Shaver
product_meta.description:
Note : Please note that during your initial use or whenever hair is longer, it is recommended to go slowly as longer hairs can pull or pinch. As an added step to ensure your unit is performing perfectly, it is possible your blade was jarred loose during shipping and the undercarriage of the blade unit is not in complete contact with the inner power pin that powers the blades. Please note this can easily be corrected by simply removing the blade and then reinstalling so that the underlying power pin is correctly positioned in the undercarriage of the blade unit for shaving.

AMAZON.COM
The MANGROOMER PROFESSIONAL Do-It-Yourself Electric Back Hair Shaver is the newest and most advanced back shaver available for men to quickly and easily eliminate their back hair. It features a PROFESSIONAL handle you can extend and lock at any length you choose by engaging the PROFESSIONAL lock button on the handle, which enables you to create your perfect custom shaving length. The extreme reach of the shaver measures over two feet in length when fully extended, allowing you to reach even the most difficult middle and lower portions of the back.

 




MANGROOMER PROFESSIONAL Do-It-Yourself Electric Back Hair Shaver
The Newest and Most Advanced Back Hair Shaver for Men


The PROFESSIONAL has a new rechargeable battery power for quick-charging and operates at optimum power between charges. Additional new features include the 100% non-slip rubberized grip along the handle and body that allows for maximum maneuverability and increased control at any shaving angle. The PROFESSIONAL's premium blade design delivers superior smooth shave results and measures 1.5 inches in width for maximum coverage and fewer strokes. The sleek, lightweight, and compact design folds flat for storage and travel. Accessories included are a new protection cap, a cleaning brush, an A/C recharging adaptor, and an instruction booklet. Product Features: 

 * Adjustable Handle with Extreme Reach - Handle measures over two feet in length, helping you reach the difficult middle and lower portions of the back.
 * Rechargeable Battery Power - New quick-charging feature allows shaver to operate at optimum power between charges.
 * Premium Extra-wide Blade Design - Measures 1.5 inches in width for maximum coverage in fewer strokes and allows for an extremely close shave, smooth results, and less potential for ingrown hairs.
 * Ideal 135-degree Opening - Unique patent-pending design creates the ideal angle for back-shaving and maneuverability.
 * PROFESSIONAL Handle Lock Button - Lets you extend and lock the handle at any length to create your own custom shaving length. 
 * 100% Rubberized - Features a non-slip rubber grip, handle, and body for maximum control and comfort.
 * Lightweight Design - Has a sleek, lightweight, and compact design that folds flat for easy storage and travel.
 * Protection Cap - Fits snugly on shaver to protect the premium blade when not in use.

What's in the Box
One MANGROOMER PROFESSIONAL Do-It-Yourself Electric Back Hair Shaver with a new protection cap, a cleaning brush, an A/C recharging adaptor, and an instruction booklet.
feature_bullets: Extendable and Adjustable Handle - PROFESSIONAL Handle extends and locks at any length you choose by engaging professional lock button on handle
Rechargeable Battery Power - New quick-charging and operates at optimum power between charges
PROFESSIONAL Premium Blade Design - Superior smooth shave results and measures 1.5 inches in width for maximum coverage and fewer strokes
Extreme Reach - PROFESSIONAL Handle measures over 2 feet in length when fully extended to reach even the most difficult middle and lower portions of the back
100% Rubberized - Features Non-Slip Rubberized Grip Handle and Body for maximum control and comfort. Battery Charge Life: Up to 3 Hours
Please note your shaver will not work while plugged into the power source, so please unplug and then turn ON to operate.
